name: Recycled Frogroover
description:
Our tongue-in-cheek submission for Jamuslala!

The theme for the Jam was "Renewable Resources", or the 5Rs (Reduce, Reuse, Recycle, Refuse, Restore). In the last 2 hours of the Jam we recycled an old Jam game and added assets from other Jam games we have made.

The recycled games:
https://abbabon.itch.io/swamp-of-the-frogroover
https://odedil87.itch.io/shellter
https://itamardag.itch.io/fuetatoes
https://itamardag.itch.io/vex-of-the-gods
